ssms.controller

Class EveryFrameCombatPlugin_Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.BaseEveryFrameCombatPlugin
      • ssms.controller.EveryFrameCombatPlugin_Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.CombatEnginePlugin, com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.EveryFrameCombatPlugin

    public class EveryFrameCombatPlugin_Controller
extends com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.BaseEveryFrameCombatPlugin
    Handles all controls for combat via game controller.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Preserves the targeting selection state.
